mapper.sql: id, buyer_task_no AS buyerTaskNo, title, owner_no AS ownerNo, `desc`, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, `status`, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, buyer_open_id AS buyerOpenId, buyer_name AS buyerName, purchase_commission_mode AS purchaseCommissionMode, purchase_commission_str AS purchaseCommissionStr, is_del AS isDel, creator, modifier
